text:
I use httpserver: apache2.2.8 +mod_jk + mod_SSL ,tomcat's version is 6.0.16

my OS is redhat4(linux) i use 1 apache +5 tomcat for loading blancer,but when it runing more then one day ,my cpu use always 99% ,but not all tomcats,every times is one or two tomcats has this effect.
of cause ,if for a long time ,others tomcat maybe 99% too.


tomcat's log has no exception,and apache's errolog  has no exception too.

this host has only about 20 users ,another host has the same configs it's os is AIX  and has more than 2000 users ,but no this problem
.

i am chinese ,sorry for my poor english!
creator: kuaiyuelaogong@126.com
markt@apache.org
text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.

The bug you describe could be an application or configuration bug rather than a Tomcat bug.

Please use the users list (http://tomcat.apache.org/lists.html) to help you work out what is wrong.

If it is a Tomcat bug then please feel free to re-open this bug report.
